org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core

Class Path

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.Path
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Path
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Describe a path as a sequence of Edge such that from each of its Head Node there is an link to the next Tail Node in the sequence
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Path(java.util.List<Edge> edges)
      Construct an object representing a path, the constructor will check if the passed list of edges is such that for every consecutive edges the head node of the first edge coincide with the tail node of the subsequent in order for connectivity to be there.
      Path(Path src)
      Copy Construct for a path
